videos.description: Knicks rookie Obi Toppin in transition finds Kevin Knox who feeds it right back to Toppin for a jam.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Toppin, Knox build chemistry early) 2020/12/11 ESHEET

videos.headline: Toppin, Knox build chemistry early

videos.description: Obi Toppin drives, spins and takes contact before converting the and-1 basket for the Knicks.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Obi Toppin spins on the baseline for and-1 bucket) 2020/12/11 ESHEET

videos.headline: Obi Toppin spins on the baseline for and-1 bucket

videos.description: Knicks rookie Obi Toppin impressive in preseason debut scoring 11 points and grabbing seven rebounds in 20 minutes of play vs. the Pistons.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NBA Highlight (Toppin puts up 11 and 7 off the bench in debut with Knicks) 2020/12/11 ESHEET SOTFULL

videos.headline: Toppin puts up 11 and 7 off the bench in debut with Knicks
